card_name: Vita, Vessel of the Great One
rules_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
Whenever Vita attacks or blocks, sacrifice another creature.
Whenever another creature you control dies, you may pay 3 life. If you do, draw a card.
Crew 7
notes: 2.1.0: Major revamp for this card. There were too many black cards crowded at 5+ mana. This gets an effect out of there, gives a nice piece for the golgari and orzhov archetypes to consider, and makes for a flashy buildaround for rakdos to try and crew. Could maybe go up to four mana and only pay 2 life, but I wanted it at 3 for now to fill out blacks curve better.
